txt.en:
'So many have died to protect this place. They have made the ultimate sacrifice to preserve ruins, memories, and scraps and shreds of a history that is slipping further away every day.

'That is why we must do all we can to remember, to preserve what is left, to honour their sacrifices. 

'These flowers have long grown only here in Evendim. Take them and place one on each of the fallen. From Evendim they came, and to Annúminas they shall return.'
'How many more good men must perish? And all in the name of power....'
Many Rangers have fallen defending Annúminas from the forces of Angmar.
Many Rangers have fallen while defending the city from Angmar. They should be honoured.
Orchalwë will be pleased to hear that you honoured the fallen Rangers.
